name: The Cockroach adventure (demo)
description:
During the 1250s in western China lived a nobleman who ruled with tyranny some small lands in the north of the country, in the great Mongol invasion everything that he loved was reduced to ashes and all his lands and people who lived in them, from the Who the last to die was this nobleman who shouted to his Gods that if they gave him another chance he would return all the bad things he did in his life. for which the great god offers him an opportunity by sending him to a world controlled by cicadas, which for centuries has oppressed all the races that lived in that place and with greater strength the cockroaches that were slaves of all races ... This man turned into a cockroach and being enslaved by a cruel porcupine was humiliated for a time in his new life, after one day accidentally after he almost killed the cockroach he died from a small landslide It was there when the spoon took courage and ripped from the back of its master a spike with this same forging a singular rapier to begin its journey to overthrow the evil king cicada.
